doc.title: A Mystic Re-Incarnation
doc.plot: A wizard is at work in his secret chamber. His subject is the dummy figure of a girl. This he dismembers, throwing the head, limbs, and torso in a pile upon the floor. He covers it with a thin cloth and with mystic incantations waves his wand. The members quickly assume their proper order and up jumps a pretty young girl in tights, apparently much bewildered by her experience.
